short_desc.text: I work as a full-time Head of Engineering with early stage startups building their products and setting up engineering teams.

long_desc.text: I work as a full-time Head of Engineering with early stage startups building their products and setting up engineering teams, contributing at every aspect of engineering process : coding, hiring, execution, people management, whatever it takes.
Aurva is a data security startup based out of Bangalore, India. Worked on engineering execution, people management, hands-on coding, product, UI/UX design, hiring, and setting up processes.

MyDoco is b2b commerce startup based out of NCR, India. I build their MVP end to end, getting them to their first 1000 retailers, and a total order volume of 20L per month eventually to raising their seed round.

Durianpay is a fintech startup based out of Indonesia and Bangalore. Led a remote team of 15 engineers in India and Indonesia building a payment gateway aggregator. Owned execution, people management and hiring for engineering.
Aasthy is a startup based out of Bangalore, India. I helped with hiring and engineering execution.
Worked with multiple companies as a consultant, helping them with the engineering team, working on the product development and the client projects.

works.text: Worked on the game server, which was written in GoLang

short_desc.text: Moonfrog Labs is a mobile gaming startup based out of Bangalore, India. I was part of the backend team, working on the game server and the analytics pipeline.

long_desc.text: Moonfrog Labs is a mobile gaming startup based out of Bangalore, India. I was part of the backend team, working on the game server and the analytics pipeline. I was responsible for the game server, which was written in GoLang, and the analytics pipeline, which was written in NodeJS. I also worked on the data warehouse, which was built on top of Redshift. I also worked on the game client, which was written in Cocos2Dx and Unity2D.

works.text: Worked on the game server, which was written in GoLang
Worked on the analytics pipeline, which was written in NodeJS
Worked on the data warehouse, which was built on top of Redshift
Worked on the game client, which was written in Cocos2Dx and Unity2D

short_desc.text: Helped build exarb as a fully bootstrapped and profitable business that now operates as a subsidiary of Cogmac. We made an end-to-end trading suite aimed at F&O arbitrage in NSE/BSE markets. I owned the trader facing part of the suite, product + ui/ux + dev + devops + customer support

long_desc.text: We made an end-to-end trading suite aimed at F&O arbitrage in NSE/BSE markets. I owned the trader facing part of the suite, product + ui/ux + dev + devops + customer support.Products Developed: Complete trading terminal for adding/managing strategies with real-time updates from different market-multicast feeds, P&L calculations, validations, trade-trackers, report generation; administrator client; admin terminal for Risk Management system (RMS); trade-log analysis tools and benchmarking tools.

works.text: Build a desktop based trading portal for adding/managing strategies with real-time updates from different market-multicast feeds, P&L calculations, validations, trade-trackers and report generation.
Built an administrator terminal and admin/user portal for Risk Management system (RMS).
Wrote various tools for trade latency benchmarking, trade-log analysis, trader performance, trader behaviour, bias measurement etc.
Sat with traders everyday to come up with UX enhancements based on eyeballing their behaviour and on feedback.

short_desc.text: Worked as a software developer on Citrix flagship NetScaler product team. Primarily worked on GSLB (Global Server Load Balancing), statistics aggregation, cli validation.

long_desc.text: Worked as a software developer on Citrix flagship NetScaler product team. Primarily worked on GSLB (Global Server Load Balancing), statistics aggregation, cli validation.

works.text: Extended the GSLB (Global Server Load Balancing) statistics aggregation functionality from a single box to a cluster of devices.
Over 250 bug fixes and other small maintenance features.
